Katy Perry_Last Friday Night (T.G.I.F.).lyrics summary: Katy Perry's 'Last Friday Night (T.G.I.F.)' recounts a wild night of partying, dancing on tables, taking shots, spending too much money, and experiencing misadventures leading to an unforgettable night.
Katy Perry_Last Friday Night (T.G.I.F.).lyrics sentiment: Mixed because the lyrics celebrate fun and freedom but also hint at regret and consequences.
Katy Perry_Last Friday Night (T.G.I.F.).music energy: High because of the upbeat tempo and lively instrumentation common in pop party anthems.
Katy Perry_Last Friday Night (T.G.I.F.).music danceability: High because the track has a strong, consistent beat and rhythm ideal for dancing.
Katy Perry_Last Friday Night (T.G.I.F.).valence: High because the overall mood is fun, energetic, and celebratory.
Katy Perry_Last Friday Night (T.G.I.F.).mode: Major because the melody is bright and joyful, typical for pop music anthems.

Nicki Minaj_Starships.music energy: High because the tempo is fast and the track has an intense and vibrant arrangement.
Nicki Minaj_Starships.music danceability: High because the beat is strong and consistent, designed for dancing.
Nicki Minaj_Starships.valence: High because the overall tone is uplifting, joyful, and carefree.
Nicki Minaj_Starships.mode: Minor because the track is noted to be in B minor, which has a slightly more introspective sound despite the upbeat tempo.

Nicki Minaj_Va Va Voom.lyrics summary: A song that delves into desire, moral dilemmas, and the magnetic pull of physical attraction.

Nicki Minaj_Va Va Voom.valence: High because the tone is vibrant and exciting.
Nicki Minaj_Va Va Voom.mode: Major because it's in a G♯ Major key, giving it a bright and resolved tonal quality.
